item.title: By: RL
item.dc:creator: RL
item.description: O M G. These are amazing. I used avocado oil since I was concerned my olive oil may be too strong but I want to try them that way now too! I made my own carob chips so used those & and a dash of cinnamon to enhance the oats :) I was wondering if I should chill them before baking. Nope - they're PERFECT at 10 mins. Crispy edges, chewy centers, very light texture just like a buttery oatmeal cookie... I'm in love. Thank you, thank you, thank you! Since my chips are kinda sweet and miss the semi-bitter taste of real chocolate, I am going to probably just use maple syrup the next time I make these cookies and skip the coconut sugar or just reduce it! :)
